name: vert
description: VERT is a self-hosted dashboard and toolkit for managing and visualizing services and metrics in homelab or small server environments, focused on UX and simplicity.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Visualize and manage homelab services from a centralized dashboard

features.title: Metrics Visualization
features.description: Display system metrics and service health with charts and graphs

features.title: Simple Interface
features.description: Navigate an intuitive, user-friendly interface designed for homelabs

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Start, stop, and monitor services from the web interface

features.title: Status Monitoring
features.description: Check service status and availability at a glance with visual indicators

features.title: Resource Tracking
features.description: Monitor CPU, memory, and disk usage across your infrastructure

features.title: Quick Access
features.description: Access service web interfaces directly from the dashboard with quick links

features.title: Customizable Views
features.description: Organize services and metrics to match your homelab setup
